lemma op_hnr[sepref_fr_rules]: assumes PURE: "CONSTRAINT (IS_PURE PRES_ZERO_UNIQUE) A" shows "(uncurry (amtx_pointwise_binop_fold_impl1 fi N M), uncurry (RETURN oo PR_CONST (mtx_pointwise_binop f))) \<in> (amtx_assn N M A)\<^sup>d *\<^sub>a (amtx_assn N M A)\<^sup>k \<rightarrow>\<^sub>a amtx_assn N M A"
